com.bluecreation.melodysmart

Class DeviceInfoService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bluecreation.melodysmart.LEService
      • com.bluecreation.melodysmart.DeviceInfoService

  • public class DeviceInfoService
extends LEService
    This class provides an interface to access the Device Information Service in a remote MelodySmart device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE
      Types of information that can be accessed on the DeviceInfoService
      static interface  DeviceInfoService.Listener
      Class used to report the application or module using the MelodySmart library about information read on the Device Information Service in a remote MelodySmart device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceInfoService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE,java.lang.String> getInfo()
      Returns a hashmap with all the information read from the remote MelodySmart device.
      void read(DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE type)
      Starts reading information from a remote MelodySmart device.
      void registerListener(DeviceInfoService.Listener listener)
      Registers a new listener that will get notified about events from this service.
      void unregisterListener(DeviceInfoService.Listener listener)
      Removes a listener that will stop being reported about events from this service If the listener is null or has not been previously registered, nothing happens

    • Method Detail

      • getInfo

        public java.util.HashMap<DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE,java.lang.String> getInfo()
        Returns a hashmap with all the information read from the remote MelodySmart device. If information for some value in DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE was not read, it may not appear on the hashmap or its value may be null.
        Returns:
        A hashmap with the information read from the remote device.

      • read

        public void read(DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE type)
        Starts reading information from a remote MelodySmart device. Results are reported back by DeviceInfoService.Listener.onInfoRead(com.bluecreation.melodysmart.DeviceInfoService.INFO_TYPE, String). If the DeviceInfo system was not discovered on the device, nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        type - The information to be rad.

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(DeviceInfoService.Listener listener)
        Registers a new listener that will get notified about events from this service. If the listener is null or has previously been registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The new listener to registerv

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(DeviceInfoService.Listener listener)
        Removes a listener that will stop being reported about events from this service If the listener is null or has not been previously registered, nothing happens
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove
